summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Juneau Street, from 51st Avenue South to 52nd Avenue South; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8597 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
